description: This file defines the layout for an Android activity, including a DrawerLayout with a main content area containing a ConstraintLayout, a FrameLayout for fragments, a BottomNavigationView, and a NavigationView for a sliding drawer menu.

classes.name: androidx.drawerlayout.widget.DrawerLayout
classes.description: Root layout providing a sliding navigation drawer

classes.name: androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout
classes.description: Main container for app content, including fragment container and bottom navigation bar

classes.name: com.google.android.material.bottomnavigation.BottomNavigationView
classes.description: Bottom navigation bar for switching between main sections

classes.name: com.google.android.material.navigation.NavigationView
classes.description: Navigation drawer for category and account actions
